liar-s-bar.title: liar's bar: The Ultimate Deception Game (Liar's Bar)
liar-s-bar.description: Step into the world of Liar's Bar, an immersive multiplayer experience where deception meets strategy.

HomeIframe.title: Enter the Liar's Bar
HomeIframe.description: Join Liar's Bar, where every move counts in a world of deceit.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Liar's Bar is an immersive multiplayer online game in a deceptive bar setting, involving various bluffing games.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: 1. Choose Your Game Mode and Character
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Enjoy a realistic bar atmosphere simulation.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Play engaging games centered on deception.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Explore depth in gameplay with intriguing backstories.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Benefit from continuous updates and feedback.
